resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660d-be0c-42b5-2e4f-4216a22340fb#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Ókeresztény szarkofág, 4. század, Museo Laterano, Róma, dombormű.</string>
            <string language="en">Paleochristian sarcopchagus, 4th century, Museo Laterano, Rome, relief.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paleochristian sarcopchagus, 4. Jahrhundert, Museo
Laterano, Rom, Entlastung.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sarcopchagus de Paleochristian, 4ème siècle, 
Museo Laterano, Rome, soulagement.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sarcopchagus de Paleochristian, ô século, Museo 
Laterano, Roma, relevo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sarcopchagus di Paleochristian, quarto secolo, 
Museo Laterano, Roma, rilievo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Sarcopchagus Paleochristian, 4$ος αιώνας, Museo
Laterano, Ρώμη, ανακούφιση.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sarcopchagus de Paleochristian, 4to siglo, Museo 
Laterano, Roma, relevación.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A szarkofágok kedvelt témája Krisztus életét,bemutató jelenetek, és a passió ábrázolása. Ennek példája a Museo Laterano szarkofágja.</string>
            <string language="en">Scenes from Christ’s life and the illustration of Passion are popular topics on sarcophagus. An example for tis is the sarcophagus of Museo Laterano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Krisztus,  passió,  szarkofág,  ókeresztény kor,  dombormű,  </string>
            <string language="en">Christ, Passion, sarcophagus, paleochristian era, relief,</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Szenen vom Christ?s Leben und von der Abbildung der 
Neigung sind populäre Themen auf Sarkophag. Ein Beispiel 
für tis ist der Sarkophag von Museo Laterano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les scènes de la vie de Christ?s et de l'illustration de 
la passion sont des sujets populaires sur le sarcophage. Un 
exemple pour des tis est le sarcophage de Museo Laterano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As cenas da vida de Christ?s e da ilustração da paixão 
são tópicos populares no sarcófago. Um exemplo para tis é o 
sarcófago de Museo Laterano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le scene da durata di Christ?s e dall'illustrazione di 
passione sono soggetti popolari sul sarcophagus. Un esempio per 
i tis è il sarcophagus di Museo Laterano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σκηνές από τη ζωή Christ?s και την απεικόνιση 
του πάθους είναι δημοφιλή θέματα στη Σαρκοφάγο. Ένα 
παράδειγμα για τα tis είναι η Σαρκοφάγος Museo Laterano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las escenas de la vida de Christ?s y de la ilustración de
la pasión son asuntos populares en el sarcófago. Un ejemplo 
para los tis es el sarcófago de Museo Laterano.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Christ, Neigung, Sarkophag, paleochristian Ära, 
Entlastung,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Christ, passion, sarcophage, ère paleochristian, 
soulagement,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Christ, paixão, sarcófago, era paleochristian, relevo,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Christ, passione, sarcophagus, era paleochristian, rilievo,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χριστός, πάθος, Σαρκοφάγος, paleochristian εποχή, 
ανακούφιση,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cristo, pasión, sarcófago, era paleochristian, relevación,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
